posts.post_content:
Would like to purchase 1888 Sporting Times supplements with team photos. Please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url] if you have one available.

Thanks--Jay

Jay:

I have this 1890 New York BB Club Sporting Times Supplement if you are interested:
Thanks Phil, but I am looking for those scarce large supplements from 1888 that Lew Lipset wrote about in his Old Cardboard article.
neat Supplement Phil!  Never seen that before.  How many were in the set/series?
Thanks, Rob. I don't know but I have never seen another 1890 team either, may be just as scarce as the 1888's that Jay is looking for. Lew would probably know best.
